entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 70 percent chance of light snow later this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
